mapper.insert: INSERT INTO whole_vacation (start, end, content) VALUES (#{start}, #{end}, #{content})
INSERT INTO vacation (code, start, end, content, employee_id) VALUES (#{code}, #{start}, #{end}, #{content}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select: SELECT v.*, GROUP_CONCAT(vh.date ORDER BY vh.date SEPARATOR ',') AS date FROM vacation v JOIN vacation_date vh ON v.idx = vh.vacation_idx WHERE v.idx = #{idx} GROUP BY v.idx, v.content, v.start, v.end, vh.vacation_idx

SELECT v.*, GROUP_CONCAT(vh.date ORDER BY vh.date SEPARATOR ',') AS date FROM vacation v JOIN vacation_date vh ON v.idx = vh.vacation_idx WHERE date between DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-01') and LAST_DAY(DATE_FORMAT(vh.date, '%Y-%m-%d')) and approval_status in ('W', 'R', 'C') GROUP BY v.idx, v.content, v.start, v.end, vh.vacation_idx ORDER BY v.start desc
SELECT res.* FROM ( (SELECT *, 'N' AS is_whole FROM vacation WHERE approval_status = 'A' ORDER BY start desc) UNION ALL (SELECT *, 'Y' AS is_whole FROM whole_vacation) ) AS res;
